creator: China Highlights Int'l Travel Service Co., Ltd
descriptionHtml:
China Train Booking supports to use e-ticket to get on your high speed train. You don’t have to collect paper train ticket before departure. By using your ID, you can easily get on board in a contactless way. This will help to use less paper and save more than 30 minutes of ticket collection ahead of departure.

Why use China Train Booking?
Easily check real-time train schedules and availability online. Quickly book tickets, with as little as 1 hour to spare before departure. Collect tickets by presenting our e-vouchers. Fast and safe ticket delivery service. Freely select your favorite seat on high speed trains. Check station maps and layouts to navigate. Pay without credit card fees or any hidden charges. Receive in-app notification about your booking status. Over 90% positive reviews.

China Train Booking app, launched by chinahighlights.com - one of the best tour companies internationally, maintains a top ticketing service reputation. Our 1-to-1 customer service answers your every question in no time, and provides useful suggestions based on your situation. From hundreds of traveler reviews, we have received over 90% five-star ratings. Our repeat customers account for over 60% of bookings.

What to expect with the app:
● Search real time train schedules and ticket availability online.
● Quickly book tickets, with as little as 1 hour to spare before departure.
● Alternatives are provided to help you adjust your travel plan.
● Freely choose your favorite seat, e.g. window seat or aisle seat.
● Cancel ticket up to 24h before departure.
● Payment is protected by PayPal, international credit cards security, WeChat, or Alipay.
● No credit card fees or any hidden charges.
● Get help with transfers, station layouts, maps etc, by reading in-app instructions.
● Receive in-app notification about your booking status.
● 1-to-1 customer service helps you deal with any emergency through WeChat, hotline, and email.

What our users say about us:
“Travelling for the first time to China, I wasn’t sure how to book the train tickets. This app has made the whole process so easy! It’s very easy to use, the staff is very helpful and responded quickly! If trains aren’t available, they offer alternatives straight away. The staff also provides lots of general advice and translated notes in English and Chinese. The service provided by the app and staff is superb! Highly recommended! ” - Thomas83H from Britain

“Not only did they notify me of train cancellations due to typhoons, they also rebooked for next day by grabbing last two tickets. Communication is perfect and fast. Thank you. You make buying tickets so easy.” - Eyepiktureu from US.

“Beijing - Xi’an - Chongqing - Yichang - Shiyan - Wuhan - Shanghai - Beijing. All through the China Train Booking app. They are amazing! Costumer support is the best I have ever received. They answer in no time at all on email and if you download wechat it goes even faster and smoother. Don’t plan you train travels in China anywhere else since they well do anything to make your journey piece of cake. They will also make sure your train tickets are delivered at your accommodations so you will not have to do anything yourself other than take a taxi to the station and board the train. Perfect!” - MadsHoffmannH from Denmark

“Amazing and incredible service, it helped you in EVERYTHING, tickets, seating, gives you directions, examples, Etc. The staff is very kind and always has an eye on you, which is very important in a country where do not understand a word!!!! Thank you for all your help, a 5 star service.!!! Keep on doing it!!!” - Maniac300769 from Mexico
descriptionShort: Buy China Train Tickets Online & Search Train Schedules

appDetails.developerAddress: Building 6, Chuangyi Business Park, 70 Qilidian Road, Guilin, Guangxi, 541004, China
appDetails.developerName: China Highlights Int'l Travel Service Co., Ltd
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We are so excited to tell that you can use e-ticket now! No need to collect paper ticket, you can easily board your train just with your passport.
More updates here:
1.E-ticket is available, saving you some time to pick up train ticket.
2.Supporting service chat helps you book ticket(s) without worries.
3.We simplify our instructions of train travel in China and make it easier to understand.
More information about E-ticket: https://www.chinatrainbooking.com/china-train-guide/e-ticket.html

“Not only did they notify me of train cancellations due to typhoons, they also rebooked for next day by grabbing last two tickets. Communication is perfect and fast. Thank you. You make buying tickets so easy.” - Eyepiktureu from US.

“Beijing - Xi’an - Chongqing - Yichang - Shiyan - Wuhan - Shanghai - Beijing. All through the China Train Booking app. They are amazing! Costumer support is the best I have ever received. They answer in no time at all on email and if you download wechat it goes even faster and smoother. Don’t plan you train travels in China anywhere else since they well do anything to make your journey piece of cake. They will also make sure your train tickets are delivered at your accommodations so you will not have to do anything yourself other than take a taxi to the station and board the train. Perfect!” - MadsHoffmannH from Denmark

“Amazing and incredible service, it helped you in EVERYTHING, tickets, seating, gives you directions, examples, Etc. The staff is very kind and always has an eye on you, which is very important in a country where do not understand a word!!!! Thank you for all your help, a 5 star service.!!! Keep on doing it!!!” - Maniac300769 from Mexico

creator: China Highlights Int'l Travel Service Co., Ltd
descriptionHtml:
China Train Booking supports to use e-ticket to get on your high speed train. You don’t have to collect paper train ticket before departure. By using your ID, you can easily get on board in a contactless way. This will help to use less paper and save more than 30 minutes of ticket collection ahead of departure.

Why use China Train Booking?
Easily check real-time train schedules and availability online. Quickly book tickets, with as little as 1 hour to spare before departure. Collect tickets by presenting our e-vouchers. Fast and safe ticket delivery service. Freely select your favorite seat on high speed trains. Check station maps and layouts to navigate. Pay without credit card fees or any hidden charges. Receive in-app notification about your booking status. Over 90% positive reviews.

China Train Booking app, launched by chinahighlights.com - one of the best tour companies internationally, maintains a top ticketing service reputation. Our 1-to-1 customer service answers your every question in no time, and provides useful suggestions based on your situation. From hundreds of traveler reviews, we have received over 90% five-star ratings. Our repeat customers account for over 60% of bookings.

What to expect with the app:
● Search real time train schedules and ticket availability online.
● Quickly book tickets, with as little as 1 hour to spare before departure.
● Alternatives are provided to help you adjust your travel plan.
● Freely choose your favorite seat, e.g. window seat or aisle seat.
● Cancel ticket up to 24h before departure.
● Payment is protected by PayPal, international credit cards security, WeChat, or Alipay.
● No credit card fees or any hidden charges.
● Get help with transfers, station layouts, maps etc, by reading in-app instructions.
● Receive in-app notification about your booking status.
● 1-to-1 customer service helps you deal with any emergency through WeChat, hotline, and email.

What our users say about us:
“Travelling for the first time to China, I wasn’t sure how to book the train tickets. This app has made the whole process so easy! It’s very easy to use, the staff is very helpful and responded quickly! If trains aren’t available, they offer alternatives straight away. The staff also provides lots of general advice and translated notes in English and Chinese. The service provided by the app and staff is superb! Highly recommended! ” - Thomas83H from Britain
